name: Procedural Planet
description:
A procedural world generator.

This is a beta version of a much larger project that I am working on. If the game appears frozen, it is possible the "Detail" setting may be too high.

Controls:

- WASD movement

- Spacebar to jump/swim-up

- Hold Alt to swim down

- Shift to Sprint

Options:

- Seed: Any string of characters that will determine the world generation. Leave blank for random.

- Size: Determines the radius of the planet

- Detail: Determines the subdivision multiplier for the planet. Suggested to not go above 4, as higher settings may cause the generator to crash.

- In the Pause Menu: "/seed" will print out the Seed String for the current world.

Future updates will include more diverse land structures, environments, and flora. Eventually, I will develop AI fauna, NPC characters, NPC civilizations. My end goal is to develop a story that will weave all of this together into a fully developed story game.

Share this Game:https://99thnehemiah.itch.io/procedural-planet
